title: ExcelAdd Cells

metadata.description: Learn about ExcelAdd Cells with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Adding New Columns
Columns can be added and deleted. You access the menu by right clicking the column letter. New columns are added to the same place you clicked.
Let's try to create a new column
B
.
Health	Attack
Charmander	309	39
Pikachu	320	35
Bulbasaur	318	45
Squirtle	314	44
Copy Values
Right click on the column and select "Insert Columns":
And a new column is created:

B
:
Trainer	Health	Attack
Charmander	Iva	309	39
Pikachu	Iva	320	35
Bulbasaur	Liam	318	45
Squirtle	Liam	314	44
Copy Values
Adding New Rows
Rows can also be added and deleted. You access the menu by right clicking the row number. New rows are added to the same place you clicked.
Let's try to create a new row
4
.
We forgot to add Iva's Pokemon,
Marowak
. Lets add his data to the new row
4
, by typing or copying the following values:
Trainer	Health	Attack
Charmander	Iva	309	39
Pikachu	Iva	320	35
Marowak	Iva	425	60
Bulbasaur	Liam	318	45
Squirtle	Liam	314	44
Copy Values
Excellent job!
Test Yourself With Exercises
Excel Exercise:
Complete the name of the
command
for adding columns:
Columns
Submit Answer »
Start the Exercise

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers ExcelAdd Cells concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use ExcelAdd Cells effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of ExcelAdd Cells and how to apply it in your projects.
